entry.title: Notas Unity
entry.summary: Dibujando el background. porque no usar time.deltatime cuando usamos addforce en un rigitbody?? global coordenates o local cordenates? global son utiles cuando estas armando toda la scena y quieres que todo quede en un buen lugar, local son utiles cuando estas rotando un objeto (unico )en donde su pocicion no depende de otros.

entry.title: Notas Deep Learning
entry.summary: What we need to define for a basic machine leaning applying? what is the input data from which we want to extract information(model)? what kind of model is most appropriate for this data? what kind of answer would we like to elicit from new data based on this model? if we can answer these three questions, we can set up a machine learning workflow hat will build our model and produce o...
